channel.title: Saturdayproject on Shenanigans!
channel.description: Recent content in Saturdayproject on Shenanigans!

item.title: Saturday Project: Monster Hunting with Vue.js
item.author: p@steamshard.net (Paweł J. Wal)
item.description: I’m studying Vue.js right now - here’s a simple app that I made in the process.

item.title: Saturday Project: Alien Generator in JavaScript
item.author: p@steamshard.net (Paweł J. Wal)
item.description: I’ve been studying ES6 a lot lately. Here’s a fun little project that we can do with it over an hour or so on a Saturday: an alien generator!

item.title: Ultrasonic theremin
item.author: p@steamshard.net (Paweł J. Wal)
item.description: I’ve been wanting to construct an instrument in the spirit of a theremin for quite a while. Of course, I have neither the skills to construct a proper theremin, nor the time to master them. What I do have is an Arduino board, some sensors and a couple of spare parts.
